item.title: Google Maps upgrades navigation in India with Gemini, safety alerts
item.description: India becomes the second market after the U.S. to get Gemini-powered navigation on Google Maps.

item.title: Perplexity to pay Snap $400M to power search in Snapchat
item.description: Snap said today that it has signed a deal with AI-powered search engine Perplexity to power a new chatbot. As part of the deal, Perplexity will pay Sn...

item.title: Anker-backed hybrid RV startup Evotrex comes out of stealth
item.description: Evotrex joins startups like Lightship, Pebble, and Grounded in trying to disrupt the RV market, which is skewing younger.

item.title: Ventures Platform, one of Africa’s most active early-stage investors, has raised another $64 million
item.description: The Lagos-based firm and one of Africa’s most active early-stage investors is targeting a final close of $75 million for its second fund.

item.title: Discord’s Family Center update now lets parents monitor weekly purchases
item.description: Discord has rolled out updates to its Family Center, giving guardians more insights into their teens’ usage patterns, including purchases, top interac...
